SCP 0.2.5.9009

Show the palettes collected by SCP

Source: R/SCP-plot.R
show_palettes.Rd

Show the palettes collected by SCP

Usage

show_palettes(
  palettes = NULL,
  type = c("discrete", "continuous"),
  index = NULL,
  palette_names = NULL,
  return_names = TRUE,
  return_palettes = FALSE
)

Arguments

index

The index of the palette in SCP palette list. Show all palettes in SCP by default.

palette_names

Name of the palettes to be shown

return_names

Whether to return the palette names.

return_palettes

Whether to return the palettes.

Examples

all_palettes <- show_palettes(return_palettes = TRUE)

names(all_palettes)

show_palettes(index = 1:20)

#>  [1] "BrBG"     "PiYG"     "PRGn"     "PuOr"     "RdBu"     "RdGy"     "RdYlBu"   "RdYlGn"   "Spectral" "Accent"  
#> [11] "Dark2"    "Paired"   "Pastel1"  "Pastel2"  "Set1"     "Set2"     "Set3"     "Blues"    "BuGn"     "BuPu"    
show_palettes(palette_names = c("Paired", "nejm", "simspec", "Spectral", "jet"), return_palettes = TRUE)

show_palettes(type = "discrete", index = 1:20)

#>  [1] "Accent"         "Dark2"          "Paired"         "Pastel1"        "Pastel2"        "Set1"          
#>  [7] "Set2"           "Set3"           "npg"            "aaas"           "nejm"           "lancet"        
#> [13] "jama"           "jco"            "ucscgb"         "d3-category10"  "d3-category20"  "d3-category20b"
#> [19] "d3-category20c" "igv"           
show_palettes(type = "continuous", index = 1:20)

#>  [1] "BrBG"     "PiYG"     "PRGn"     "PuOr"     "RdBu"     "RdGy"     "RdYlBu"   "RdYlGn"   "Spectral" "Blues"   
#> [11] "BuGn"     "BuPu"     "GnBu"     "Greens"   "Greys"    "Oranges"  "OrRd"     "PuBu"     "PuBuGn"   "PuRd"
